snippet.title: An Elaborate History of Chess - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1255020/An_Elaborate_History_of_Chess/

An Elaborate History of Chess is a crafting strategy game touring the history of Chess. In true Chess tradition build castles, explore dungeons, farm turnips and get checkmated by a tree. Find answers to Chess's darkest questions, like why the horse piece moves in an L-shape.

Join our Discord to stay up to date: https://discord.gg/f2hdFN6
Check out our last game Paper Pirates: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1234220/Paper_Pirates/

#indiegame #gaming #gamedev
